name: Sláine the Slacker.
description:
Follow Sláine as she has to deal with buying her meds, help her best friend, have no cash on her name, and a weird nice lady that will surrelly not do anything suspicious. 

Warning. This game has references about parental abuse and mentions of sex, nothing is show, but you should be aware of it if you get unconfortable with it. 

This is my entry for Rainbow Game Jam 2019!
